data.eml:eml: A new genus and three new species of Drilonematidae (Rhabditida, Drilonematoidea) from earthworms

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ivanova, Elena S., Hope, Duane (2009): A new genus and three new species of Drilonematidae (Rhabditida, Drilonematoidea) from earthworms. Zootaxa 2293: 53-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.191461
